DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare wear migration follow hip prosthesis : 1 . Charnley monoblock 22.2mm caput OGEE polyethylene acetabular component 2 . Spectron EF stem Reflection polyethylene cup 28 mm CoCr caput 3 . Spectron EF stem XLPE cup 28 mm CoCr caput 4 . Spectron EF stem Reflection polyethylene cup 28 mm Oxinium caput 5 . Spectron EF stem XLPE cup 28 mm Oxinium caput
DOC.brief_title: RSA-Study Cemented Hip Prostheses With Five Different Articulations
